column5: Beep beep! Come stay in one of our new rentals – the Roadrunner Tiny Cabin. Located just 1 ½ miles from the entrance to Palo Duro Canyon State Park, this is the vacation rental with the closest access to the second largest canyon in the United States! Our cabin offers a unique getaway, surrounded by the West Texas landscape and its amazing wildlife and views. Enjoy the beauty of country living, with the convenience of the town of Canyon just 11 miles away.
